name: Prototype: Airwaves
description:
Race as far as possible before falling out of the level!

Controls:

  • Left or right arrow keys to steer.
  • Down arrow to brake.
  • Hold down brake long enough, then let go to boost!

My schedule was filled with meetings during this Extra Life Game Jam, so I didn't get very far.  Still, I kind of like the prototype as is, so I figured I post it.

Change Logs:

  • v00 - Initial Release
  • v01 - Poor choice of speed increase over time.  Drastically reduced this value.

Known Bugs:

  • Speed does not reset on restart.
  • At high speeds, the vehicle can fly through walls.
